specialFlags.name: Artificial Intelligence
specialFlags.reason:
Core product: AI hardware and full-stack software platform for data centers and accelerated computing.
AI centrality: AI workloads (training/inference) are a principal value engine for the product line.
Proprietary AI tech: Proprietary GPU architectures (Blackwell, Hopper), CUDA, TensorRT, NeMo, DGX systems, NVIDIA AI Enterprise platform, Jetson, DRIVE AGX.
Moat / defensibility: Hardware-software integration, developer ecosystem, ISV optimizations, broad partner network, legacy pivot.
